reqs: Continuation of MUSC 410/500D, concentrating on larger tonal forms, fine points of analytical notation, research tools in Schenker studies, and examination of published and unpublished analyses by Schenker and his pupils. With 403J.
courseName: Advanced Studies in Music Theory - ADV SCHENKER ANL
description: Advanced seminar in music theory. May be repeated for credit if different topics are covered.
